page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: My house is semi-detached and it is number 9. I have 7 rooms - bathroom, living room, kitchen, toilet and three bedrooms. I have a front and back garden. My mum hoovers and so does my sister. I do the dusting and my other sister does the washing up. My mum or my older sister cook the meals. Sleeping - My sister and I share a room. We have a duvet and two sheets. We have recently had our room decorated which my mum and dad did. I have wallpaper and a bunk bed. We have one single cupboard and one double. In our living room we have wallpaper and upholstered furniture - a sofa, a rocking chair and another non rocking chair. We have a computer and a stereo.In our house we have three televisions, one colour and two black and white. We also have a freezer, tumble drier and a washing machine.
